title: Privacy Policy
titleDescription1: This Privacy Policy is prepared by Blue Lantern LLC and whose registered address is Geneva, Switzerland (“We”) are committed to protecting and preserving the privacy of our visitors when visiting our site or communicating electronically with us. This policy sets out how we process any personal data we collect from you or that you provide to us through our website and social media sites. We confirm that we will keep your information secure and comply fully with all applicable SWISS Data Protection legislation and regulations. Please read the following carefully to understand what happens to personal data that you choose to provide to us, or that we collect from you when you visit our sites. By submitting information you are accepting and consenting to the practices described in this policy.
titleTypes: Types of information we may collect from you
titleTypesDescription: Depending on who You are and how We are engaging with You, We may collect information including: Personal identifiers such as name and email address. Online identifiers such asIP address, device identifier, browser identifier, internet service provider, operating system, date/time stamp, clickstream data, geolocation data, cookies, beacons, pixel tags, log files and mobile ad identifiers or similar technology, unique pseudonyms and other persistent and probabilistic identifiers that can be used to identify a particular individual or device, information from analytics services (such as Google and Visual Website Optimiser); Engagement specific information such as any financial information you directly provide in the forms on this website or through third party account aggregation services, communication and general preferences, interview and survey responses, opinions and feedback for research purposes, and payment related information such as billing address, shipping address, cardholder details, card number, bank account number and other financial information.
titleHow: How we may use the information we collect
titleHowListTitle: We use the information in the following ways:
listItem1: - To provide you with information and/or services that you request from us
listItem2: - To contact you to provide the information requested
listItem3: - Website usage information such as location, pages visited, length of the session
titleDisclosureDescription1: Any information you provide to us will either be emailed directly to us or may be stored on a secure server.
titleDisclosureDescription2: Yes, We may share Your information with third parties listed below for the purposes set forth in this Privacy Notice, subject to a lawful basis and in compliance with applicable laws  (including, as applicable, after providing You additional notice, or obtaining Your consent).Vendors and service providers: They provide services to help us with our business activities such as research, analyzing Your usage patterns and behaviour and compiling insights, showing personalized advertisements, marketing, data enrichment, administration of events, compliance with laws, including screening prospective customers, customers, end customers and individuals in order to comply with sanctions regulations, preventing violation of laws, performance monitoring, product implementation and integrations, recruitment, and other business purposes.Partners: They assist in marketing outreach and other activities, sponsor events, product integration and other strategic initiatives. We may disclose Your personal information to Partners for their marketing outreach where You have consented to such disclosure, for identifying common customers to assess Your business needs and propose suitable products and for other joint-initiatives.
titleDisclosureDescription3: We will use all reasonable efforts to ensure that your personal data is not disclosed to regional/national institutions and authorities unless required by law or other regulations.
titleDisclosureDescription4: Unfortunately, the transmission of information via the internet is not completely secure. Although we will do our best to protect your personal data, we cannot guarantee the security of your data transmitted to our site; any transmission is at your own risk. Once we have received your information, we will use strict procedures and security features to try to prevent unauthorized access.
titleYourRights: Your rights – access to your personal data
titleYourRightsDescription1: You have the right to ensure that your personal data is being processed lawfully (“Subject Access Right”). Your subject access right can be exercised in accordance with data protection laws and regulations. Any subject access request must be made in writing to
titleYourRightsDescription2: . We will provide your personal data to you within the statutory time frames. To enable us to trace any of your personal data that we may be holding, we may need to request further information from you. If you complain about how we have used your information, you have the right to complain to the Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO).
titleChangesDescription: Any changes we may make to our privacy policy in the future will be posted on this page and, where appropriate, notified to you by e-mail. Please check back frequently to see any updates or changes to our privacy policy.
titleContactDescription: Questions, comments, and requests regarding this privacy policy are welcomed and should be addressed to
